subject: Bug#422043: desktop-base: has no effect on KDE
body:
Fathi Boudra wrote:
> I fixed the issue in the svn repo rev. 79:
> * Fix dir_config path in kdeglobals and kdesktoprc doesn't support symlink.

can you prepare an updated package please, so that it will be included
in etch r1?

--
